mapper.select: select file_no as fileNo, qna_no as qnaNo, filename, filepath from qna_file_tbl where qna_no = #{_parameter}

select qcomment_no as qcommentNo, qcomment_writer as qcommentWriter, qna_no as qnaNo, qcomment_content as qcommentContent, qcomment_time as qcommentTime, qcomment_ref as qcommentRef from qna_comment where qna_no = #{_parameter} order by qcommentNo asc
mapper.update: update qna_tbl set qna_title = #{qnaTitle}, qna_content = #{qnaContent}, qna_cate_no = #{qnaCateNo}, qna_secret = #{qnaSecret}, qna_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') where qna_no = #{qnaNo}
update qna_comment set qcomment_content = #{qcommentContent}, qcomment_time = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') where qcomment_no = #{qcommentNo}

select qna_no as qnaNo, substr(replace(qna_writer,substr(qna_writer,2,2),'**'),1,instr(qna_writer,'@',1,1)-1)as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_views as qnaViews, qna_date as qnaDate, qna_cate_no as qnaCateNo, qna_status as qnaStatus from qna_tbl

select qna_no as qnaNo, substr(replace(qna_writer,substr(qna_writer,2,2),'**'),1,instr(qna_writer,'@',1,1)-1)as qnaWriter, qna_title as qnaTitle, qna_content as qnaContent, qna_views as qnaViews, qna_date as qnaDate, qna_cate_no as qnaCateNo, qna_status as qnaStatus from(select rownum as rnum, q.* from(select * from qna_tbl order by 1 desc)q) where rnum between #{start} and #{end}
